name: Car Legends (itch)
description:
Car Legends is a car game where you need to avoid crashing into other cars.

  • Online/Offline Top 3 Leaderboard
  • Customizable Speed
  • Demo Mode

Making the game was kind of a challenge because the task was to use this abomination of a sortware

You can enter Demo mode by clicking on the big red underline on the titlescreen

Source Code: https://github.com/cfpwastaken/carlegends
